item.title: Why RISC-V Can Be a Game Changer?
item.description: In a world dominated by proprietary chip architectures, a quiet shift is underway. RISC-V, an open-source alternative, is redefining how we think about processor design—especially in the VLSI world—by enabling greater customization, transparency, and control at the hardware level.

item.title: ROS 2 vs ROS 1: What Changed and Why It Matters?
item.description: Is ROS 1 still the right choice for your next robotics project, with its well-established tools and wide community support? Or, given the growing demand for real-time performance, scalability, and modern middleware, is it finally time to make the move to ROS 2?
